name: Dodgeball (itch) (Dabby Media)
description:
The goal is simple - Dodge the Balls for as long as you can!

Dodgeball features two modes (Classic and Mixed) and adjustable difficulty (Casual, Challenge and Stress).

In Classic mode, your only obstacles are standard Dodgeballs. In Mixed mode, two additional ball types are added to the 'mix'.

The higher you set the difficulty, the more balls spawn, and standard Dodgeballs move faster.

Controls:
- Mouse: Move Around
- Space (In-Game): Pause Game
- Escape (In-Game): Quit Game

Music by Nctrnm, licensed under Creative Commons.
Sound Effects from MixKit.
